attributes.additional_details: Russia has had a lot of racist cases in football. It is time the government takes action. Keep the politics to aside and fight for justice AGAINST racism. A recent case of racism in Russia was seen in a match on Wednesday 23rd October 2013. The match was CSKA Moscow vs Man City. A player called Yaya Toure was racially abused by a group of fans. Yet no action took place. Stand up to this racism by boycotting the World Cup in Russia
